title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Transfer Learning and Bayesian Optimization for Biological Sequence Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of biology fundamentals and data analysis
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core concepts of transfer learning and Bayesian optimization in biological sequence optimization.
Learners can apply strategies to reduce experimental iterations in the development of diverse biological sequences to real-world cases.
Learners can demonstrate optimization processes using simulation tools provided in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
